name: part_008
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】HOPE IS ON THE MOVE! #3DRyS [dR9q_J-8mfM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: IRyS performs a cover of 'Stand By You'.
IRyS reflects on singing with Marine and her love for HIGE DAN.
IRyS notices the time transition to night in the virtual city.
IRyS interacts with her mascots, Bloom and Gloom.
IRyS announces the final guest of the showcase.
IRyS and Tokoyami Towa begin performing 'FACT'.

subtitles.original: Ah, and guess what? Time flies!
subtitles.english: Ah, and guess what? Time flies!

subtitles.original: Like, I can't believe it. It was just like daytime just...

subtitles.original: a few minutes ago. Now it's already nighttime!
subtitles.english: a few minutes ago. Now it's already nighttime!

subtitles.english: Humongous moon! It looks like it's going to crash into Earth anytime soon.

subtitles.english: I'm so glad the weather is nice today.

subtitles.english: No rain whatsoever. If there was rain, this show would have been canceled.

subtitles.english: It's beautiful.

subtitles.original: アレ？

subtitles.english: Wha-wha-wha-what? I thought I told you guys to stay at home!

subtitles.original: My little friends Bloom and Gloom are here!
subtitles.english: My little friends Bloom and Gloom are here!

subtitles.original: Ah, they're so cute! Let me introduce them to you.

subtitles.english: Say hi to the camera, Gloom.

subtitles.english: Ah, so cute!

subtitles.original: Hey! And this one is Bloom.
subtitles.english: Hey! And this one is Bloom.

subtitles.original: えい！
subtitles.english: Hey!

subtitles.original: Thank you guys so much for coming.
subtitles.english: Thank you guys so much for coming.

subtitles.original: Ah, is there anything you guys want me...
subtitles.english: Ah, is there anything you guys want me...

subtitles.original: want me to do with Bloom and Gloom today? The chat?
subtitles.english: want me to do with Bloom and Gloom today? The chat?

subtitles.english: Chat, I'm watching you. Any sort of pose you want me to do with them?

subtitles.original: I'll take maybe one request because we're running out of time.
subtitles.english: I'll take maybe one request because we're running out of time.

subtitles.original: One request if I can see in the comments. Hmm?
subtitles.english: One request if I can see in the comments. Hmm?

subtitles.english: "Punch them"? Did I see it?

subtitles.original: Did I see a comment to punch them?
subtitles.english: Did I see a comment to punch them?

subtitles.original: Am I going to punch them?
subtitles.english: Am I going to punch them?

subtitles.original: You're going to take it, right? You're going to take it, right?
subtitles.english: You're going to take it, right? You're going to take it, right?

subtitles.original: Okay... はぁっ！
subtitles.english: Okay... Hah!

subtitles.original: Okay... Sorry, sorry, sorry!
subtitles.english: Okay... Sorry, sorry, sorry!

subtitles.english: This is... this is fan service. There's nothing else I can do.

subtitles.original: Okay, you're going to take it good, yeah? You're going to take it. Okay.
subtitles.english: Okay, you're going to take it good, yeah? You're going to take it. Okay.

subtitles.english: Hah!

subtitles.original: Hey! Alrighty.
subtitles.english: Hey! Alrighty.

subtitles.original: Now I'm done with you two. I'm done with you two.
subtitles.english: Now I'm done with you two. I'm done with you two.

subtitles.original: That was great. That was... they were great punching bags.
subtitles.english: That was great. That was... they were great punching bags.

subtitles.original: No, I'm sorry, I'm sorry! They're big hug, big hug, big hug!
subtitles.english: No, I'm sorry, I'm sorry! They're big hug, big hug, big hug!

subtitles.english: Oh, no, no, you're scared. No, no, no. It's okay. Big hug, big hug.

subtitles.english: you guys are very soft. You guys can handle it. We're fine.

subtitles.english: Alrighty then! Thank you guys so much for coming, Bloom and Gloom.

subtitles.english: I think it's about time you guys go rest, yeah?
